1-Yml is data serialisation language similar to json
2-It is a superset of json
3-can have yaml format or yml format
4-have yaml extenstion in vs code YAML by Redhat
5-NO double quotation in keys and values unlike in json
6-Use # sign to comment a yaml
7-Indentation 2 spaces are recommended
8-https://learnxinyminutes.com/docs/yaml/
